content:
Jose recorded the number of sick days he took and the number of T-shirts he owned over several years.

**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
|||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:| --:
**Sick days** | $6$ | $7.5$ | $0.5$ | $3$ | $4$ | $9.5$
**T-shirts** | $6$ | $7$ | $7$ | $7$ | $5$ | $6$
